Summary: saw bright light out my window looked out and saw 3 white lights with reddish light pulsating grabbed camera and got a video
divs: Sighting DetailsI was laying in my bed watching tv, I felt the urge to look at my window with the blinds closed, but saw bright lights through them. I opened them to see what was so bright, then I saw 3 bright white lights forming a perfect triangle with a dull red pulsating light in the center of the object. I got very excited, and had the mind set to grab my camera which has a video recorder, opened my back door and started shooting the video. It made no noise and moved very slowly across the sky along the tree line. This was approximately at 11:45 pm on January 5, 2012. The triangle object started to turn on a yaw axis,and continued to rotate counter close wise which showed multiple lights. It was very dark in color, such as black. It vanished in a split second.
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Pooler
There was one other sighting in Pooler on or around January 5th 2012
This sighting has never been favorited.
